ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "A light refreshing salad for hot summer days, super simple and only 3 ingredients! Always a hit."
ins: In a medium bowl, blend together the frozen whipped topping and cream cheese. Fold in grapes. Serve immediately, or chill for 30 minutes. This is pretty garnished with a small bunch of red grapes.
